sentences.sentence: Aflatoxins were discovered in 1960, when 100000 Turkey Poults died from eating fungus-infested peanut meal.
sentences.translation: 黄曲霉毒素在1960年被发现，当时100000只火鸡的幼禽死于食用了被菌类感染的花生米。

sentences.sentence: To improve Chinese verb teaching, we should do well the following poults: 1. Explain the meaning of Chinese verbs in detail;
sentences.translation: 为搞好汉语动词教学应做到以下几点：1、做好汉语动词词义的讲解。
